entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
